abstract: 1. Shell morphology, growth pattern and population dynamics of the land snail Xerolenta obvia (Menke, 1828) in two areas of different climatic conditions within a temperate climate region Magdalena Marzec, Elżbieta Kuźnik-Kowalska, Małgorzata Proćków Acta Zoologica Academiae Scientiarum Hungaricae CrossRef
